item.title: Women embriodered Off White cream colour crossbody Shoulder bag
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Women Hand embriodered- Off White cream colour -Everyday Shoulder bag . Peacock embroidered
item.content:encoded:
Women embriodered Everyday crossbody Shoulder bag.

Material: Cotton Fabric.

Zipper Closure.

Hand embroidered.

Practical Design with plenty of room for your cell phone, Wallet, Books, Makeup accesories and so on.

Note: We do our best to ensure that our photos are as true to color as possible. However, due to inconsistencies monitors, digital photography and production variations, we cannot guarantee that the color you see on This can be carries for travel, work, shopping, holidays.it walks you everywhere.Long straps. Excellent gift for friends , family , birthdays etc.

Note: Colour may slightly vary.
